alert.note: Alert for Grant (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 4:23PM CDT until May 30 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Grant County in west central Minnesota... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 422 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Elbow Lake, or 21 miles south of Fergus Falls, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elbow Lake, Barrett, Wendell, Erdahl and Hoffman. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 73 and 80. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
